languages.text: {n}Покрытая письменами женщина складывает руки в аквилу.{/n} "Имя мне сестра Джуд и я представляю Скорбящий Сонм. Помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его, захватили мы еретиков, бесстыдными мыслями полных, и пытали сообразно их прегрешениям. Среди воплей разобрали мы, что глава астропатического хора замышляет предательство династии фон Валанциус. Никто не может лгать, когда его плоть ласкает пламя! Скорбящий Сонм оцепил здание хора и выдать еретика потребовал. Лишь из уважения к помазанни{mf|ку|це} не стал Сонм тотчас сжигать гнездо распутного еретика, но одно слово — и мы заберем его для праведного очищения".
languages.translation_comment: Кадр на прааую сторону весов. После куя представитель кладет на чашу факел. Спикер уходит в дверь.
Кадр на прааую сторону весов. После куя представитель кладет на чашу факел. Спикер уходит в дверь.

languages.text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. From what we were able to discern from their wailing and screaming, the head of the Astropathic Choir is plotting to betray House von Valancius. No one is a liar when flame is caressing their flesh! The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den on the spot. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."
languages.original_text: {n}Покрытая письменами женщина складывает руки в аквилу.{/n} "Имя мне сестра Джуд и я представляю Скорбящий Сонм. Помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его, захватили мы еретиков, бесстыдными мыслями полных, и пытали сообразно их прегрешениям. Среди воплей разобрали мы, что глава астропатического хора замышляет предательство династии фон Валанциус. Никто не может лгать, когда его плоть ласкает пламя! Скорбящий Сонм оцепил здание хора и выдать еретика потребовал. Лишь из уважения к помазанни{mf|ку|це} не стал Сонм тотчас сжигать гнездо распутного еретика, но одно слово — и мы заберем его для праведного очищения".

traits.locale_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Judh and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts; we captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. And from what we made out of their wailing and screaming, the head of the Astropathic Choir is plotting to betray House von Valancius. No one is a liar when flame is caressing their flesh! The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den at once, but say a word and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

languages.text: {n}Eine Frau mit Schriftzeichen auf ihrer Haut bildet mit ihren Armen den Aquila.{/n} "Mein Name ist Schwester Juth. Ich vertrete den Traurigen Gastgeber. Oh, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Gottimperators, wir sind auf eine Gruppe von Ketzern gestoßen, deren Geist von schamlosen Gedanken erfüllt war. Wir nahmen sie gefangen und folterten sie, wie es für ihre Vergehen angemessen war. Ihren Klagen und Schreien konnten wir entnehmen, dass das Oberhaupt des astropathischen Chors plant, Haus von Valancius zu verraten. Niemand lügt, wenn Flammen sein Fleisch streicheln! Der Traurige Gastgeber hat den Chor umstellt und die Auslieferung des Ketzers gefordert. Wir haben allein aus Respekt vor {mf|dem|der} Gesalbten darauf verzichtet, das Versteck des irrgeleiteten Ketzers niederzubrennen. Ein Wort von Euch reicht jedoch, dass wir ihn festnehmen und einer rechtschaffenen Läuterung unterziehen."
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

languages.text: {n}Une femme à la peau couverte de saintes écritures croise les bras en formant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} « Je me nomme sœur Juth et je représente le Concile des Affligés. Ô {mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu, nous avons découvert un groupe d'hérétiques dont l'esprit débordait des pensées les plus honteuses. Nous les avons capturés et torturés comme ils le méritaient pour leurs transgressions. D'après ce qu'ils ont pu nous révéler entre deux hurlements, le chef du chœur astropathique se prépare à trahir la maison von Valancius. Personne ne ment sous la caresse des flammes ! Le Concile des Affligés a encerclé le siège du chœur et exigé que l'hérétique lui soit livré. C'est uniquement par respect pour l'{mf|élu|élue} que nous nous sommes abstenus de brûler l'antre de cet abject criminel sur-le-champ. Cependant, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire pour que nous l'appréhendions et le purifiions comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

languages.text: {n}一位皮肤上写满经文的女性向你做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“我是犹斯修女，我代表阴沉之主发言。噢，神皇的神选者啊，我们遇到了一群异端分子，他们的头脑中充斥着最为无耻的思想。我们抓住了他们，严刑拷打，惩罚他们的罪过。从他们的哀嚎和尖叫中，我们听到了他们供认的密谋——星语唱诗班的唱诗大师，正在密谋背叛冯·瓦兰修斯家族。毕竟，当烈焰吞噬罪人的肉体时，所有人都会说出真话！于是，阴沉之主立刻包围了星语唱诗班的所在之处，要求他们把那个异端分子交出来。我们之所以没有当场将那个异端分子的巢穴化为灰烬，完全是出于对神选者的尊重。不过，只要您一声令下，我们就抓住他，让正义净化他的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. From what we were able to discern from their wailing and screaming, the head of the Astropathic Choir is plotting to betray House von Valancius. No one is a liar when flame is caressing their flesh! The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den on the spot. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

languages.text: {n}Una mujer con las escrituras grabadas en su piel forma el signo del Aquila con los brazos.{/n} «Soy la hermana Juth, representante de la Hueste Dolosa. Oh, ungid{mf|o|a} del Dios Emperador, hemos descubierto a un grupo de herejes cuyas mentes estaban llenas de pensamientos inaceptables. Los atrapamos y los torturamos como merecen sus transgresiones. Entre sus alaridos y gemidos, logramos descubrir que el líder del Coro de Astrópatas trama traicionar a la casa von Valancius. ¡Nadie miente bajo el beso de las llamas! La Hueste Dolosa rodeó el edificio del Coro y exigió la entrega del hereje. Por respeto a{mf|l ungido| la ungida}, nos abstuvimos de quemar la guarida de ese hereje en el acto. Pero si da la orden, nos lo llevaremos para purificarlo debidamente».
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den on the spot. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

Pero si da la orden, nos lo llevaremos para purificarlo debidamente».

languages.text: {n}肌全体に経典の線が入った女性が、両腕をアクィラの形に組む。{/n}「私の名はシスター・ジュス、ドールフル・ホストの代表です。ああ、神帝陛下に聖別された方よ、私たちは、心が最も恥知らずな考えで溢れている異端者の一団に出くわしました。私たちは彼らを捕らえ、その罪にふさわしく拷問しました。彼らの泣き叫ぶ声から私たちが見抜いたところによれば、感応通信聖歌隊の隊長はフォン・ヴァランシウス家を裏切ることを企んでいます。炎が肉体を撫でるとき、誰も嘘をつくことなどできません！ドールフル・ホストは聖歌隊の建物を取り囲み、異端者を引き渡すように要求しました。その場で異端者の巣窟を焼き払うことを避けたのは、ただ聖別されし者への敬意からでした。しかし、一言言ってくれれば、私たちは彼を連行し、正しい清めを受けさせることができるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. From what we were able to discern from their wailing and screaming, the head of the Astropathic Choir is plotting to betray House von Valancius. No one is a liar when flame is caressing their flesh! The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den on the spot. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

languages.text: {n}Vücudunun her zerresi metinlerle kaplı bir kadın, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaparak kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Benim adım Rahibe Juth, Konakçı'yı temsilen huzurunuzda bulunuyorum. Ey Tanrı İmparator'un meshettiği, zihinleri en arsız düşüncelerle dolup taşan bir grup kâfire rastladık. Kendilerini yakalayıp onlara cürümlerinin layık olduğu şekilde işkence ettik. Feryat figan çığlıklarından anlayabildiğimiz kadarıyla Astropatik Koro'nun başı, von Valancius Hanesi'ne ihanet planları kurguluyor. Eti alevlerle boyanan kimse yalan söylemez! Konakçı, Koro binasını kuşatıp o kâfirin teslimini talep etmiştir. Yoldan çıkmış bu kâfirin inini oracıkta ateşe vermekten imtina ettiysek bu, yalnızca kutsanmışa olan saygımızdandır. Lakin tek bir sözünüzle onu himayemiz altına alır ve hak ettiği arınmaya tabi tutmakta tereddüt etmeyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}A woman with lines of scripture all over her skin folds her arms into an Aquila.{/n} "My name is Sister Juth and I represent the Doleful Host. O God-Emperor's anointed one, we came upon a group of heretics whose minds brimmed with the most shameless thoughts. We captured them and tortured them as befits their transgressions. From what we were able to discern from their wailing and screaming, the head of the Astropathic Choir is plotting to betray House von Valancius. No one is a liar when flame is caressing their flesh! The Doleful Host surrounded the Choir building and demanded that the heretic be handed over. It was solely out of respect for the anointed one that we refrained from burning down the wayward heretic's den on the spot. However, say but the word, and we shall take him, that he may undergo a righteous cleansing."

Ey Tanrı İmparator'un meshettiği, zihinleri en arsız düşüncelerle dolup taşan bir grup kâfire rastladık. Kendilerini yakalayıp onlara cürümlerinin layık olduğu şekilde işkence ettik. Feryat figan çığlıklarından anlayabildiğimiz kadarıyla Astropatik Koro'nun başı, von Valancius Hanesi'ne ihanet planları kurguluyor. Eti alevlerle boyanan kimse yalan söylemez! Konakçı, Koro binasını kuşatıp o sapkının teslimini talep etmiştir. Yoldan çıkmış bu kâfirin inini oracıkta ateşe vermekten imtina ettiysek bu yalnızca kutsanmışa olan saygımızdandır. Lakin tek bir sözünüzle, onu himayemiz altına alır ve hak ettiği arınmaya tabi tutmakta tereddüt dahi etmeyiz."
